question:
####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
When the Corp installs a piece of ice with Mti Mwekundu, can they trash other ice protecting the server?
answer:
Yes.

Does installing a piece of ice with Mti Mwekundu cause [K. P. Lynn](/en/card/13052) to trigger twice during a single run?
